name: nw_interface_type_t
desc: Types of network interfaces, based on their link layer media types.

items.name: var nw_interface_type_wifi: nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: The network interface type used for communication over Wi-Fi networks.

items.name: var nw_interface_type_cellular: nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: The network interface type used for communication over cellular networks.

items.name: var nw_interface_type_wired: nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: The network interface type used for communication over wired Ethernet networks.

items.name: var nw_interface_type_loopback: nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: The network interface type used for communication over local loopback networks.

items.name: var nw_interface_type_other: nw_interface_type_t
items.desc: The network interface type used for communication over virtual networks or networks of unknown types.
